content: i knew as a kid that something wasn‚Äôt right, and there were so many clues and breadcrumbs. but life, society and family kept judging me towards what they thought was ‚Äúnormal‚Äù and i grew up not knowing what being trans was. eventually i worked it out, it was kinda inevitable lol.
